Mswati III Mswati III yiNgwenyama yeMbuso wakaNgwane (25 Mábasa 1986). Ingwenyama Mswati yatalwa yatiwa ngekutsi ngumntfwanenkhosi Makhosetive esibhedlela sase RFM kaManzini. Live lakaNgwane lincane ngebubanti, kantsi likakwe live lase Ningizimu Afrika enyakatfo, ngentansi, nangasenshonalanga. Emphumalanga likakwe live laseMozambique. Inhlokodolobha yakaNgwane kuseMbabane, kantsi sigodlo nephalamende yelive kukaLobamba. Lidolobha lelikhulu kukaManzini. Bantfu bakaNgwane, linengi labo ngeMaswati, kubuye kube nalabambalwa labaphunga ngaphandle.
